content: just about every knitter you meet will have a go-to recipe for knitting plain and simple socks while i love mixing things up i always come back to knitting my socks cuff down with a reinforced heel-flap and short row heel turn if you re new to knitting socks this can sound intimidating fret not i m here to walk you through the process step-by-step also be sure to check out my accompanying video tutorial on youtube after knitting this pattern i hope you ll come to love sock knitting or that it helps you discover your own favorite way of knitting socks
